words.source: H859 pers. pron. 2ms אַתָּה 'you'; KJV 'thou', ESV 'you', NASB 'you'
H1696 Piel impf. 2ms of דָּבַר 'to speak'; KJV 'shalt speak', ESV 'shall speak', NASB 'shall speak'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English versions
H3605 n.ms constr. כֹּל 'all, every'; KJV 'all', ESV 'all', NASB 'all'
H834 rel. pron. אֲשֶׁר 'who, which, that'; KJV 'that', ESV 'that', NASB 'that'
H6680 Piel impf. 1cs + 2ms suff. of צָוָה 'to command'; KJV 'I command thee', ESV 'I command you', NASB 'I command you'
H175 conj. + proper name; all trans. agree
H251 n.ms constr. + 2ms suff. אָח 'brother'; KJV 'thy brother', ESV 'your brother', NASB 'your brother'
H1696 Piel impf. 3ms of דָּבַר 'to speak'; KJV 'shall speak', ESV 'shall tell', NASB 'shall speak'
H413 prep. 'to, toward'; all trans. agree
H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H7971 conj. + Piel perf. 3ms of שָׁלַח 'to send, let go'; KJV 'shall let … go', ESV 'shall let … go', NASB 'will let … go'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English versions
H1121 n.mp constr. בֵּן 'son'; KJV 'the children of', ESV 'the people of', NASB 'the sons of'
H3478 proper name; all trans. agree
H776 prep. min + n.fs constr. אֶרֶץ 'land' + 3ms suff.; KJV 'out of his land', ESV 'out of his land', NASB 'from his land'
